name: Jump Switch (GameZanga2015 Version)
description:
>>UPDATE: We just got the 3rd place in Game Zanga Jam, Thanks for all the support,
in the near future we will start working on a full game of Jump Switch for mobile platform, Stay Tune for the updates<<

Think before you JUMP !!!

Jump Switch is a platform, side scroller, Pixel Art game .
you have to reach the end of the level without falling of the ground.

This game has been done in a Game Jam called 'Game Zanga'
from 31-8-2015 to 2-8-2105.
www.gamezanga.com

NOTE: Based on you connection, it may take few seconds to load up.

Twitter: @BugGames Facebook: /BugGamesTeam
